chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (ei : E.Env) (p : ImpProg) (ef : E.Env), exec ei p ef -> exec ei p |= eq ef

Premises:
Inductive ImpProg : Type := Iskip : ImpProg | Iset : forall A : Type, E.Var A -> E.Expr A -> ImpProg | Iif : E.Expr bool -> ImpProg -> ImpProg -> ImpProg | Iseq : ImpProg -> ImpProg -> ImpProg | Iwhile : E.Expr bool -> ImpProg -> ImpProg Arguments Iset [A]%type_scope
*** [ E.Env : Type ]
Inductive eq (A : Type) (x : A) : A -> Prop := eq_refl : x = x Arguments eq {A}%type_scope Arguments eq_refl {A}%type_scope {x}, [A] _
Module E : ExprLang 
Inductive exec : E.Env -> ImpProg -> E.Env -> Prop := exec_Iskip : forall e : E.Env, exec e Iskip e | exec_Iset : forall (A : Type) (e : E.Env) (x : E.Var A) (expr : E.Expr A), exec e (Iset x expr) (E.upd x (E.eval expr e) e) | exec_Iif : forall (e : E.Env) (cond : E.Expr bool) (p1 p2 : ImpProg), exec e (if E.eval cond e then p1 else p2) |= exec e (Iif cond p1 p2) | exec_Iseq : forall (e : E.Env) (p1 p2 : ImpProg) (e' e'' : E.Env), exec e p1 e' -> exec e' p2 e'' -> exec e (Iseq p1 p2) e
exec_Iseq : forall (e : E.Env) (p1 p2 : ImpProg) (e' e'' : E.Env), exec e p1 e' -> exec e' p2 e'' -> exec e (Iseq p1 p2) e''
exec_ind : forall P : E.Env -> ImpProg -> E.Env -> Prop, (forall e : E.Env, P e Iskip e) -> (forall (A : Type) (e : E.Env) (x : E.Var A) (expr : E.Expr A), P e (Iset x expr) (E.upd x (E.eval expr e) e)) -> (forall (e : E.Env) (cond : E.Expr bool) (p1 p2 : ImpProg) (e' : E.Env), exec e (if E.eval cond e then p1 else p2) e' -> P e (if E.eval cond e then p1 else p2) e' -> P e (Iif cond p1 p2) e') ->...-> forall (e : E.Env) (i : ImpProg), exec e i |= P e i
exec_sind : forall P : E.Env -> ImpProg -> E.Env -> SProp, (forall e : E.Env, P e Iskip e) -> (forall (A : Type) (e : E.Env) (x : E.Var A) (expr : E.Expr A), P e (Iset x expr) (E.upd x (E.eval expr e) e)) -> (forall (e : E.Env) (cond : E.Expr bool) (p1 p2 : ImpProg) (e' : E.Env), exec e (if E.eval cond e then p1 else p2) e' -> P e (if E.eval cond e then p1 else p2) e' -> P e (Iif cond p1 p2) e') ->...-> forall (e : E.Env) (i : ImpProg), exec e i |= P e i
exec_Iwhile : forall (e : E.Env) (cond : E.Expr bool) (p : ImpProg), exec e (Iif cond (Iseq p (Iwhile cond p)) Iskip) |= exec e (Iwhile cond p)
exec_Iif_false : forall (e : E.Env) (cond : E.Expr bool) (p1 p2 : ImpProg) (e' : E.Env), E.eval cond e = false -> exec e p2 e' -> exec e (Iif cond p1 p2) e'
exec_Iif_true : forall (e : E.Env) (cond : E.Expr bool) (p1 p2 : ImpProg) (e' : E.Env), E.eval cond e = true -> exec e p1 e' -> exec e (Iif cond p1 p2) e'
wlp = fun (prog : ImpProg) (post : Pred) (e : E.Env) => exec e prog |= post : ImpProg -> Pred -> Pred
synt_wp_monotonic : forall (p : ImpProg) (post1 post2 : Pred), post1 |= post2 -> synt_wp p post1 |= synt_wp p post2
aux_wlp = fun (prog : ImpProg) (post : Pred) (e : E.Env) => match prog with | Iskip => post e | @Iset A x expr => post (E.upd x (E.eval expr e) e) | Iif cond p1 p2 => exec e (if E.eval cond e then p1 else p2) |= post | Iseq p1 p2 => forall e1 e2 : E.Env, exec e p1 e1 -> exec e1 p2 e2 -> post e2 | Iwhile cond p => exec e (Iif cond (Iseq p (Iwhile cond p)) Iskip) |= post end : ImpProg -> Pred -> Pred
exec_inversion : forall (prog : ImpProg) (e e' : E.Env), exec e prog e' -> forall post : Pred, aux_wlp prog post e -> post e'
exec_Iif : forall (e : E.Env) (cond : E.Expr bool) (p1 p2 : ImpProg), exec e (if E.eval cond e then p1 else p2) |= exec e (Iif cond p1 p2)
synt_wp_conj : forall (p : ImpProg) (post1 post2 : Pred) (e : E.Env), synt_wp p post1 e -> synt_wp p post2 e -> synt_wp p (fun e0 : E.Env => post1 e0 /\ post2 e0) e
wp = fun (prog : ImpProg) (post : Pred) (e : E.Env) => exists e' : E.Env, exec e prog e' /\ post e' : ImpProg -> Pred -> Pred
exec_test_inversion : forall (A : Type) (x : E.Var A) (expr : E.Expr A) (e e' : E.Env), exec e (Iset x expr) e' -> e' = E.upd x (E.eval expr e) e
exec_Iset : forall (A : Type) (e : E.Env) (x : E.Var A) (expr : E.Expr A), exec e (Iset x expr) (E.upd x (E.eval expr e) e)
exec_Iskip : forall e : E.Env, exec e Iskip e
PeanoNat.Nat.divide_wd = fun (x x' : nat) (Hx : x = x') (y y' : nat) (Hy : y = y') => Morphisms.trans_co_eq_inv_impl_morphism RelationClasses.iff_Transitive (exists p : nat, y = p * x) (exists p : nat, y = p * x') (Morphisms_Prop.ex_iff_morphism (fun p : nat => y = p * x) (fun p : nat => y = p * x') (fun p : nat => Morphisms.per_partial_app_morphism (RelationClasses.Equivalence_PER PeanoNat.Nat.eq_equiv) (p * x) (p * x') (Morphisms.Reflexive_partial_app_morphism PeanoNat.Nat.mul_wd (Morphisms.reflexive_proper_proxy RelationClasses.Equivalence_Reflexive p) x x' Hx))) (exists p : nat, y' = p * x') (exists p : nat, y'...
wp_sound : forall (prog : ImpProg) (post : Pred), synt_wp prog post |= prog [=post =]
Fin.of_nat_lt = fix of_nat_lt (p n : nat) {struct p} : p < n -> Fin.t n := match n as n0 return (p < n0 -> Fin.t n0) with | 0 => fun H : p < 0 => False_rect (Fin.t 0) (PeanoNat.Nat.nlt_0_r p H) | S n' => match p as p0 return (p0 < S n' -> Fin.t (S n')) with | 0 => fun _ : 0 < S n' => Fin.F1 | S p' => fun H : S p' < S n' => Fin.FS (of_nat_lt p' n' (Lt.lt_S_n p' n' H)) end end : forall p : nat, lt p |= Fin.t Arguments Fin.of_nat_lt {p n}%nat_scope
EqdepFacts.eq_dep1_ind : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> Type) (p : U) (x : P p) (q : U) (y : P q) (P0 : Prop), (forall h : q = p, x = eq_rect q P y p h -> P0) -> EqdepFacts.eq_dep1 U P p x q y -> P0
Inductive eq_dep1 (U : Type) (P : U -> Type) (p : U) (x : P p) (q : U) (y : P q) : Prop := eq_dep1_intro : forall h : q = p, x = eq_rect q P y p h -> EqdepFacts.eq_dep1 U P p x q y Arguments EqdepFacts.eq_dep1 _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments EqdepFacts.eq_dep1_intro _%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive prime (p : BinNums.Z) : Prop := prime_intro : BinInt.Z.lt (BinNums.Zpos BinNums.xH) p -> (forall n : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le (BinNums.Zpos BinNums.xH) n /\ BinInt.Z.lt n p -> Znumtheory.rel_prime n p) -> Znumtheory.prime p Arguments Znumtheory.prime _%Z_scope Arguments Znumtheory.prime_intro _%Z_scope _ _%function_scope
Znumtheory.prime_ge_2 = fun (p : BinNums.Z) (H : Znumtheory.prime p) => match H with | @Znumtheory.prime_intro _ Hp _ => Zorder.Zlt_le_succ (BinNums.Zpos BinNums.xH) p Hp end : Znumtheory.prime |= BinInt.Z.le (BinNums.Zpos (BinNums.xO BinNums.xH)) Arguments Znumtheory.prime_ge_2 _%Z_scope
ImpProg_sind : forall P : ImpProg -> SProp, P Iskip -> (forall (A : Type) (x : E.Var A) (expr : E.Expr A), P (Iset x expr)) -> (forall (cond : E.Expr bool) (p1 : ImpProg), P p1 -> forall p2 : ImpProg, P p2 -> P (Iif cond p1 p2)) -> (forall p1 : ImpProg, P p1 -> forall p2 : ImpProg, P p2 -> P (Iseq p1 p2)) -> (forall (cond : E.Expr bool) (p : ImpProg), P p -> P (Iwhile cond p)) -> forall i : ImpProg, P i
ImpProg_ind : forall P : ImpProg -> Prop, P Iskip -> (forall (A : Type) (x : E.Var A) (expr : E.Expr A), P (Iset x expr)) -> (forall (cond : E.Expr bool) (p1 : ImpProg), P p1 -> forall p2 : ImpProg, P p2 -> P (Iif cond p1 p2)) -> (forall p1 : ImpProg, P p1 -> forall p2 : ImpProg, P p2 -> P (Iseq p1 p2)) -> (forall (cond : E.Expr bool) (p : ImpProg), P p -> P (Iwhile cond p)) -> forall i : ImpProg, P i

```coq
intros ei p ef H.
induction p using ImpProg_ind.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite exec_Iset. auto.
- simpl. destruct (E.eval cond ei) eqn:Heval.
  + apply exec_Iif_true with (e' := ef) in H. auto.
  + apply exec_Iif_false with (e' := ef) in H. auto.
- simpl. intros e1 e2 He1 He2.
  apply exec_Iseq with (e' := e1) (e'' := e2) in H. auto.
- simpl. apply exec_Iwhile with (e' := ef) in H. auto.
Qed.

original: intros ei p ef H. induction p using ImpProg_ind. - simpl. auto. - simpl. rewrite exec_Iset. auto. - simpl. destruct (E.eval cond ei) eqn:Heval. + apply exec_Iif_true with (e' := ef) in H. auto. + apply exec_Iif_false with (e' := ef) in H. auto. - simpl. intros e1 e2 He1 He2. apply exec_Iseq with (e' := e1) (e'' := e2) in H. auto. - simpl. apply exec_Iwhile with (e' := ef) in H. auto.
